Desc.entry: Runs for 2 weeks from the last Sunday in June until the 2nd Saturday in July. There is a varied programme of events, concerts and talks on subjects of local and community interest - music, drama, literature, local history, gardening, well dressings and family fun.

Pubs.entry: Posters; Leaflets; Dore to Door (Dore Village Society magazine)

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Monthly meeting, please contact for details
